urls.title: Call for Papers | ALTA 2022
urls.description: ALTA is the Australasian Language Technology Association, which connects NLP researchers around Australia and New Zealand. One of the primary purposes of ALTA is to organise the ALTA Workshop – the premier workshop in Australasia for sharing research in Natural Language Processing and Computational Linguistics. Submissions from students, academics and industry researchers are welcome.
